`multinetsdata` is an R package that provides a Multilevel Network Dataset. We intend to attach more datasets in the future.

## Installation

You can install the released version of multinetsdata from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("multinetsdata")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("neylsoncrepalde/multinetsdata")
```
## Example

This is a basic example using the `orch_music_multilevel` dataset and some basic igraph functions:

```{r example, eval=FALSE}
library(multinetsdata)
library(igraph)
data("orch_music_multilevel")
help(orch_music_multilevel)
plot(orch_music_multilevel, vertex.size=3, vertex.label=NA, edge.arrow.size=.3)
```
